plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and roots, but I'm not a real plant. I'm often found in a vase. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I can be made of plastic or paper.
🏠 You might put me on a table to make a room pretty.
✂️ I don't need water to survive.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a thick trunk and branches. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🌳 I provide shade on a sunny day.
🪵 I can be used to make paper and furniture.

plant.question: I am a fruit that grows on a vine. I am small, round, and can be green, red, or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🧺 I often come in bunches.
🍷 I can be used to make juice and wine.
💜 I am a popular snack.

plant.question: I grow underground and provide food for the plant, and sometimes for people too! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Rabbits love to eat me!
🥔 You can make fries out of me.
🧅 I am the part of a plant that grows under the soil.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful flowers. People often give me as a gift to show love. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 I am a popular flower.
🌹I come in many different colors.
🛡️ Be careful, I have sharp points.

plant.question: I am a very tall tree with needles instead of leaves, and cones that hold seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 You might decorate me for Christmas.
🐻 Bears like to live in forests full of me.
🧭 I can be used to make paper and wood.

plant.question: I am a green plant that grows in water. Frogs and fish like to live around me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 You might see me in a pond.
🌿 I can be long and stringy, or short and leafy.
🌊 I help keep the water clean.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. People like to eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am often covered in butter.
🌽 I come from a corn plant.
🔥 I make a popping sound when cooked.

plant.question: I am a plant that can live for a very long time, even hundreds of years. I grow very slowly and am often found in deserts. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I store water in my stem.
🏜️ I am a symbol of the American Southwest.
☀️ I thrive in hot, dry climates.

plant.question: I am a plant whose leaves are used to make a hot drink. I grow in warm, rainy places and am enjoyed all over the world. What am I?

hints.text: 🍵 People often drink me in the morning.
🌏 I am popular in many different cultures.
🍃 You steep my dried leaves in hot water.

ocean.question: I have a shell, but no bones. I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I live in the ocean
🥬 I like to eat seaweed
🏡 I carry my house on my back

ocean.question: I'm a large body of salty water. What am I?

hints.text: 🛥️ Ships sail on me
🐠 Many animals live in me
🏖️ I touch the beach

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can also squirt ink. What am I?

hints.text: 🧠 I am very smart!
🪨 I like to hide in rocks.
🐙 I have no bones.

ocean.question: I am a very large mammal that lives in the ocean and breathes air. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 Some of my kind sing songs
🐳 I am bigger than a car.
💧 I spout water from a hole on my head.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs and I'm named after a circus performer. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I have orange and white stripes.
🏠 I live in a sea anemone.
🎬 There's a famous movie about me.

ocean.question: I'm a long, thin fish that can deliver a powerful electric shock. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I live in murky water.
🐍 I look like a snake, but I'm not.
💡 I can stun my prey with electricity.

ocean.question: I'm a type of underwater mountain range. What am I?

hints.text: ⛰️ I am formed by plate tectonics
🌋 Volcanoes can be part of me
🌊 I am very large and exist below the ocean surface

ocean.question: I am a giant current in the Atlantic Ocean that brings warm water from near the equator up the East Coast of North America. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I help keep Europe warmer than it should be.
➡️ I move very fast.
🇺🇸 I affect the weather in Florida.

ocean.question: I am the deepest part of the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 Sunlight barely reaches me.
🚢 The Titanic does not lie within me
📍 I am a very deep depression in the ocean floor.

ocean.question: I am a marine reptile that hatches on beaches, swims the ocean for many years and return to the same beach to lay eggs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can hold my breath for a very long time.
🌏 I am endangered due to pollution and fishing nets.
🌱 Some species of me eat only seagrass.
